text: Somerville ( ) is a city in Middlesex County, Massachusetts, United States. It is directly to the northwest of Boston. As of 2020, the United States Census lists the city with a total population of 81,045 people, making it the most densely populated municipality in New England. As of 2020, it was the 19th most densely populated incorporated municipality in the country. It was founded in 1842, when it was separated from Charlestown. Cartoonist Paul Ryan and football player Howie Long were born here. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Somerville Chamber of Commerce * Somerville Community Corporation Category:1630 establishments in Massachusetts Category:Cities in Massachusetts
title: Somerville, Massachusetts
